channel.title: Karabiner Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 10.4.22
item.description:
About v10.4.22 Update

  • v10.4.22: __BlockUntilKeyUp__ behavior has been improved.
  • v10.4.21: __KeyDownUpToKey__ has been added.
  • v10.4.20: Fixed issues: Some Java apps (PhpStorm, RubyMine) will be crash.
  • v10.4.20: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.4.19: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.4.18: ModifierFlag manipulation when key up has been improved.
  • v10.4.17: Spotlight has been supported in AXNotifier.
  • v10.4.16: "Ignore bouncing/chattering events" has been improved.
  • v10.4.15: "Ignore bouncing/chattering events" has been improved.
  • v10.4.14: Simultaneous presses detection with rapid key typing has been improved.
  • v10.4.14: "Ignore bouncing/chattering events" has been improved.
  • v10.4.13: sysctl `karabiner.debug_show_delay` has been added.
  • v10.4.12: A minor issue has been fixed.
  • v10.4.12: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.4.11: "Ignore bouncing/chattering events" setting has been added.
  • v10.4.9: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.4.8: __SimultaneousKeyPresses__ has been improved in some corner cases.
  • v10.4.7: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.4.2: Fixed issues: Some Java apps (IntelliJ IDEA) will be crash.
  • v10.4.1: Minor UI update.
Karabiner Web Site
